price: Ǹjẹ́ àwọn ènìyàn lérò pé A óò fi wọ́n sílẹ̀ kí wọ́n máa sọ pé: “A gbàgbọ́”, tí A ò sì níí dán wọn wò?
arabic: أَحَسِبَ ٱلنَّاسُ أَن يُتۡرَكُوٓاْ أَن يَقُولُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا وَهُمۡ لَا يُفۡتَنُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: aḥasiba al-nāsu an yut'rakū an yaqūlū āmannā wahum lā yuf'tanūna
